mapper.select: select c.contract_name, c.amount, c.total, p.price, p.product_name, p.p_total, s.* FROM sale s INNER JOIN contract c ON s.contract_id= c.contract_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.product_id=c.product_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select s.sale_id, s.leave_time, t.product_name, sum(t.amount) amount, sum(t.total) total, sum(s.profit) profit, SUM(s.taxes)taxes, t.product_id from sale s INNER JOIN ( SELECT c.contract_id,p.product_name ,p.product_id,p.price,c.amount,c.total FROM product p INNER JOIN contract c ON c.product_id=p.product_id )t on t.contract_id=s.contract_id GROUP BY t.product_id;

select DATE_FORMAT(s.leave_time,'%Y-%m-%d') days, count(s.sale_id) count, s.contract_id, s.leave_time, SUM(s.taxes) taxes, SUM(s.profit) profit, a.* from sale s inner JOIN contract c on c.contract_id=s.contract_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT c.contract_id,p.product_name ,p.price,c.amount,c.total FROM product p INNER JOIN contract c ON c.product_id=p.product_id ) a ON a.contract_id=s.contract_id group by days order by s.leave_time ASC

select s.sale_id, s.leave_time, t.product_name, sum(t.amount) amount, t.product_id from sale s INNER JOIN ( SELECT c.contract_id,p.product_name ,p.product_id,p.price,c.amount,c.total FROM product p INNER JOIN contract c ON c.product_id=p.product_id )t on t.contract_id=s.contract_id where date_format(leave_time,'%Y%m')=date_format(curtime(),'%Y%m') GROUP BY t.product_id;

select s.sale_id, s.leave_time, t.product_name, sum(t.amount) amount, t.product_id from sale s INNER JOIN ( SELECT c.contract_id,p.product_name ,p.product_id,p.price,c.amount,c.total FROM product p INNER JOIN contract c ON c.product_id=p.product_id )t on t.contract_id=s.contract_id where date_format(leave_time,'%Y')=date_format(curtime(),'%Y') GROUP BY t.product_id;
